episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01: Um...[Name:PlayerNickname ].
D-do you think you have good stamina?
(Nod confidently.)
Wow! That’s promising!
(Say it’s average.)
That’s great!
Actually, I’ve a favor to ask you...

A marathon relay will be held soon, where
participants will be running in teams through
famous spots on Pasio.

I’m planning on entering the race, but I’m not
confident in my stamina, so I’d like you to practice
with me...
A-and if you can, I’d like you to join my team.

(Say you’re not sure, as a lot of
people on Pasio are athletic.)
Oh, that’s fine!

(Say you’re hesitant, as you might not
be good enough.)
Um, actually...

People who’re very athletic, like Chuck, won’t be
competing on the same day as us, so you don’t
need to worry about that.
So, you’ll run with me?! Thank you!

By the way, the prize for the team that wins first
place in the marathon is...

a dining voucher and gift card you can use
on Pasio!

(Ask her if she wanted the gift card
all along.)
Yes, that’s right. To tell the truth...

(Ask her if she wanted the dining
voucher all along.)
I-I don’t plan to use it all just so I can eat!
I want to gift my prizes.

Of course, if we win, you can receive the prize
as well, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So, we should practice hard!

As a result of the effort they put into practicing,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Jasmine’s team
won the marathon.

Days later, Jasmine gave gifts to Trista and the
others who work at the Pokémon Center.
Unused text.

Thanks to you, we managed to win. You helped
me again.
You, Trista, and the others are amazing.

You offer help to people and Pokémon who are
hurt or in trouble.

Trista and the others at the Pokémon Center are
always taking care of us sync pairs.
That’s why I wanted to thank them.
I feel relaxed when I come here.

We’re right next to the ocean, protected by
the lighthouse...
This is a special place, so keep it our secret!
You know...

The more someone helps you, and the more you
feel their compassion...

the more it makes you want to share that kindness
with others...

And that can give someone else the energy they
need to help even more people.

It becomes a relay of kindness between people
and Pokémon.
So, although it’s something small...please take this.
Jasmine’s gift was...

something [Name:PlayerNickname ] wanted for
a long time!
Hehehe, did I surprise you?
I was keen to know what you’d like...
so, I asked the others and found out what it was!

Your thoughtfulness reaches a lot of people,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
Kindness comes around just like this...
and will help you some day.
That’s what I think!
